plot: In a Mexican small village, the Mayor offers a reward for the capture of the "Charro Negro" without knowing that he is his son Raul, who is decided to take revenge of the raping and suicide...
title: El charro Negro
plot_es: In a Mexican small village, the Mayor offers a reward for the capture of the "Charro Negro" without knowing that he is his son Raul, who is decided to take revenge of the raping and suicide...
